Description:
Siedlisko Morena is situated next to Lasmiady Lake, in the scenic Masuria region. It features country-style rooms with free WiFi, an indoor swimming pool and a Polish restaurant.

Rooms at Siedlisko Morena have wooden ceilings and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a bath and a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotels indoor and outdoor swimming pool, fitness room, dry sauna and fireplace room free of charge or play on volleyball courts. The hotel features a playroom for children, as well. There is also free access to a private beach, located 100 metres from the property.

Siedlisko Morena has a restaurant serving traditional Polish food and international buffet meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner. During your meal you can enjoy a beautiful view of the lake.

Description:
AlleGorlo is situated in the village of Gorlo, on the bank of Lake Ulówki in the Masurian Landscape Park. It offers rooms  and apartments with flat-screen satellite TV, a kitchen and free Wi-Fi. Guests can use the boat, kayak and mountain bikes, free of charge.

The apartments and rooms of AlleGorlo all feature a stylish interior design. Each has a fireplace and private bathroom with a shower. The kitchens and kitchenettes all have an electric kettle, refrigerator and coffee maker.

The AlleGorlo has its own private beach on the lake and an on-site sauna. Guests of the guesthouse can get à la carte breakfast in its dining room.

Stare Juchy Railway  Station is within 3.7 km.

Description:
Tucked away in a picturesque elevated setting with some of the finest views in Beskid Maly, the Kocierz Hotel & SPA boasts excellent spa, recreational and entertainment facilities.

For guests who enjoy an active lifestyle, Kocierz Hotel & SPA offers 3 tennis courts and an indoor swimming pool.

The Kocierz Hotel & SPA is also the perfect setting for those looking for ultimate pampering and relaxation. The spa provides a wealth of luxurious treatments, and includes saunas, a spa bath and a massage studio.

Guests can choose between the traditional restaurant Karczma occupying a unique wooden building with a summer terrace, and the elegant atmosphere of the restaurant.

Guests can spend some time on the Viewing Deck admiring the surrounding landscape, or have a drink and a dance in the beautifully designed K2 night club.

Overlooking Targanice and Andrychów, the resort is located around 19 km from both Zywiec and Wadowice and 65 km from Krakow. Property offers Sniezna Kraina - a small ski slope for learning to ride, a snowy carousel and a toboggan hill. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Description:
Panorama Lake Resort apartments and rooms complex is located over Lake Sniardwy, in Nowe Guty. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Apartments offer a balcony or a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with a shower cabin, a hairdryer and toiletries. Most apartments have a lake view. Extras include 2 shared BBQ areas. Children are welcome.

The property consists of 3 separate houses, situated 10 to 40 metres from the lake. Apartments set in building number 3 are air conditioned.

At Panorama Lake Resort you will find a private beach area and water sport equipment rental. Other facilities include a gym and a sauna. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing in winter, cycling and hiking, as well as water sports and fishing. The accommodation has a limited number of paid parking spaces, while free parking is located nearby.

It is 9 km from Panorama Lake Resort to Orzysz. The popular Masurian town of Mikolajki is within a 30-minute drive. Please inform Panorama Lake Resort in advance of your expected arrival time. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with lake views. All units include a wardrobe.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at Hotel PARK UBLIK.

Description: Villa Polanica in Polanica Zdrój is a reconstruction of a Polish mansion house from the beginning of the 20th century. It offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Villa Polanica is surrounded by aged trees of the green Zdrojowy Park and features warm, elegant design with white furniture. There is a quiet library as well as a childrens playground and a billiards table. All rooms include fridges and TVs. There are elegant bathrooms with shower cabins and hairdryers. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotels sauna. Buffet breakfast is served every day and is free of charge. There also is a restaurant serving Polish and international cuisine. Villa Polanica is located in the Klodzko Valley, a popular holiday destination with hiking possibilities as well as mineral water treatments. Description:
Offering ski-to-door access, Hotel Zieleniec is set in Duszniki Zdrój in the Lower Silesia Region, with the nearest ski lift just 10 metres from the property. The hotel has a sun terrace and spa centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant with mountain views. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

Every room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The spa centre includes a dry sauna, a steam sauna and an outdoor hot tub. A variety of beauty treatments and massages is also available. The other on-site attractions include billiards, table football and table tennis, as well as a fireplace room and a kids games room. There is also a bowling alley.

This hotel has a ski school, a ski pass sales point and ski storage space and ski equipment hire and bike hire are available. The property owns 5 ski lifts connected with skiing trails in Ski Arena ZIeleniec T-bar ski lift Mieszko is 300 metres from Hotel Zieleniec. In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travellers, during dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isnt provided, your booking will be cancelled on arrival.

Description: Matteo guest house is situated in the centre of the spa town of Duszniki Zdrój in the Klodzko Valley. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi and 24-hour front desk. Matteo provides bright rooms with a private bathroom. Each carpeted room comes with a TV and a table with chairs. There is a restaurant at the guest house that serves traditional Polish and Italian meals. Breakfast buffet is also available. The location of Matteo provides a perfect starting point for exploring the Table Mountains, hiking or skiing. Duszniki Zdrój Train Station is 300 meters away and The Museum of papermaking is 900 meters away. If you require an invoice when booking a prepaid rate, please write this request and your company details in the Ask a question box. In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Góralski Dwór is located 500 metres from the Papermaking museum. It features modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Free parking is provided.

All rooms at the Dwór are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. Some have a balcony with a view of the Klodzko Valley.

Guests can benefit from BBQ facilities and a bar which serves a selection of drinks.

Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange ski storage or massage services. Guests can relax on a spacious terrace.

Góralski Dwór is located 8 km from the Zieliniec Ski Lift. Duszniki Zdrój Railway Station is 3 km away. Please note that pets are not allowed in the unit "Chalet".

Description:
Offering an indoor pool, ski rental and horseback riding, Granada Pensjonat & SPA is located in the quiet area of Duszniki Zdrój on the border of Góry Stolowe National Park, 3 km from the spa park with a mineral water pump room. Its classically furnished rooms feature free Wi-Fi access.

Bright rooms come with a TV and a balcony, as well as a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests of Granada Pensjonat & SPA have free access to the spa & wellness area including the pool, a Finnish sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. There is a garden with barbecue facilities and a childrens playground with a trampoline and swings.

Guests can enjoy a billiards room and a common lounge with a ping-pong and foosball tables and a choice of board games. There is a bicycle and Nordic walking stick rental. Breakfast is served in a restaurant. There is also a bar.

The premises are fenced and monitored. There is a car park and a barbecue hut.

It is 6 km to Bledne Skaly nature reserve, Museum of Papermaking in Duszniki Zdrój is 3.7 km away. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note, you have to walk or drive 400m along the road to the main building from the bungalows.
